news.title: Billy Joel Cancels All Concerts Due to Brain Disorder
news.summary: The musician was recently diagnosed with normal pressure hydrocephalus (NPH) and is “undergoing specific physical therapy,” according to a statement

news.title: Afrika Bambaataa Loses Child Sex Abuse and Trafficking Lawsuit via Default Judgment
news.summary: In 2021, a man sued Afrika Bambaataa, alleging that the musician abused him for years in the 1990s. The hip-hop pioneer never acknowledged the lawsuit, leading to a default judgment against him.

news.title: Saint Etienne Announce Final Album, Share Video for New Song “Glad”: Watch
news.summary: The British indie-pop trio is not breaking up, but would like “to go out with a bang” with new album International

news.title: 8 New Albums You Should Listen to Now: Stereolab, Smerz, and More
news.summary: Stream new releases from Stereolab, Smerz, Sparks, Sophia Kennedy, MSPaint, These New Puritans, Home Is Where, and Lindstrøm

news.title: Sound Talent Group Co-Founder Dave Shapiro Killed in San Diego Plane Crash
news.summary: Shapiro was among those killed when a private plane that crashed into San Diego’s Tierrasanta neighborhood, leaving no survivors
